Description:
3 BEDROOM + STUDY RANCH STYLE HOME ON 1 ACRE!
This solid double brick colonial home is privately located amongst nature on 1 acre complete with a solar heated, salt water pool. The spacious home has 3 robed bedrooms & a study, the master with walk in robe & ensuite. There is a formal lounge with ambient open fire place, whilst the home has hydronic heating throughout for comfort & convenience. The open plan kitchen/living/meals area overlooks the rear yard & inviting pool. The country kitchen has a dishwasher, stainless steel wall oven, electric cooktop & plenty of cupboard & bench space, whilst the adjacent dining area could host the largest of functions & features a gas wall heater toasty wood heater for the cooler nights. Add to the features a corner spa in the main bathroom, slate floors & quality carpets throughout, a feature parquetry floor entry & leadlight windows. Outside there is a double carport, mains water & tanks for the garden, all on a private & natural acre close to public transport the local sporting ground & the heart of Cockatoo.
Insights: 38 other 3 bedroom house in COCKATOO have recently been sold.

Description:
Total Perfection On A 1/4 Acre (approx.)
This stunning double brick character home has been built with an obvious passion for quality & style. The home boasts 3 spacious bedrooms and a study/ 4th bedroom, master with full ensuite and BIR, well-appointed timber kitchen that is positioned in the centre of the home that overlooks both the formal lounge and dining and also the family room. Also on offer are timber lined cathedral ceilings, Coonara and a feature open fireplace. Outside you will find a useable 1/4 acre (approx.) with a sealed drive, double carport, established gardens, brick paths, garden shed and a covered brick paved entertaining area that is the perfect place to sit back and enjoy the peaceful surrounds. From the moment you step inside you will feel at home, call today - your hills lifestyle awaits.

Description:
Immaculate Cottage - Walk to Shops and School
Privately positioned in a quiet no through road close to facilities this split level 3 bedroom home is ideal as a downsize or start-up property.
The kitchen overlooks the rear yard and sits adjacent to the meals area.
Living areas consist of lounge and meals area plus great rear deck on which you can sit and enjoy the peaceful outlook or watch Puffing Billy go past .
All bedrooms are robed and are serviced by the updated bathroom with separate toilet.
Enjoy all weather entertaining out the back on the deck whilst the yard is usable and has a number of fruit trees.
Other features include gas ducted heating,
garden shed, solar panels, water tank and double carport plus sealed driveway, all on a usable 1/4 acre block (approx).
Be quick to inspect this one!!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 to arrange your inspection today!

Description:
Big On Living, Big On Lifestyle!
Designed around family lifestyle this large home offers plenty of room for a growing family. There are 3 zoned living areas that consist of a large open lounge, meals area and a large rumpus room downstairs that ensures everyone has their own space. Boasting 4 bedrooms including large master with walk in robe and modern ensuite, modern hostess kitchen with huge oven/ stove plus dishwasher and a well-appointed central bathroom services the two robed bedrooms upstairs. Outdoor entertaining can be enjoyed on either the front or rear deck overlooking the backyard which has two useable flat areas for the kids plus a garden shed/workshop. The property also offers sealed drive with double carport and under house workshop.
Special features include polished timber floors, light and modern colour scheme, 2 split systems and 2 gas space heaters.
All this set on a private road only a short distance to shops, schools and transport, so be quick as this won't last!!!
Cockatoo
Cockatoo is a town in Victoria, 48 km south-east of Melbourne's central business district. Its local government area is the Shire of Cardinia. Cockatoo is named after Cockatoo Creek, which runs through the town, and which the town was previously named.
Cockatoo's small commercial centre is located along a steep section of McBride Street and includes a small supermarket and a selection of cafes and other places to eat. The Puffing Billy tourist railway line crosses right next to the shops at the base of McBride Street, recreating those days of stream train travel from long ago as it regularly passes through the town centre.
Cockatoo has a good selection of sporting facilities. In the town centre along the west side of Pakenham Road is a bowling club, basketball courts, tennis courts and other recreational facilities. The Cockatoo Sports Complex is located in Mountain Road and consists of an indoor stadium, oval, athletics track and netball courts.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Description:
CLASSIC HILLS HOME ON HALF AN ACRE!
Offers Considered Over $430,000
This gorgeous 3 bedroom + study weatherboard home has been stylishly renovated whilst retaining its classic look of yesteryear. The home features polished floors, high ceilings & a spacious sunken lounge with sliding glass doors to the deep verandahs where you can relax away the day. There are 3 spacious bedrooms, the Master with built in robes & contemporary ensuite, as well as a study, a European Laundry & designer main bathroom. The well-appointed kitchen has a contemporary feel & offers a dishwasher, 900mm free standing stove & black marble bench tops. Add to this mains gas ducted heating & a large undercover, outdoor entertaining area & your comfortable Hills lifestyle awaits. Outside there is an asphalt drive, single lock up garage, double carport, terraced gardens, a veggie patch & plenty of extra parking space, all fully fenced for the kids & animals to play. It doesnt get much better than this!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
NEAR NEW FEDERATION STYLE HOME IN THE HEART OF COCKATOO!
Only 6 years old this spacious family home ticks all the boxes classic style, comfort, space, quality & ideally located a few hundred meters from the centre of Cockatoo & all its shops & eateries. There are 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 with built in robes & the Master with walk in robe & ensuite. The modern, well-appointed kitchen features stone bench tops, a dishwasher & overlooks the family room & meals area so you can keep an eye on the little ones. Add to this a study, a formal dining room & the double garage has been converted into a rumpus room complete with wood heater & wet bar. Offering high ceilings, ornate ceiling roses, polished floors & quality finishings throughout this home leaves nothing to do. Outside there is a large, undercover deck for entertaining, an 8 person spa, a triple garage with concrete floor & power, a fenced rear yard, landscaped gardens & an asphalt drive once again leaving nothing to do but enjoy!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
CHARMING HILLS FAMILY HOME!
This 4 bedroom character hills western red cedar home is situated on a quarter of an acre close to public transport & the Cockatoo township & features pitched ceilings, polished floorboards & flows over 3 split levels adding to the unique appeal of the home. The abundance of windows welcome heaps of natural light that warms the front deck & spacious lounge room which features an ambient wood heater, whilst the home has mains gas ducted heating throughout for the ultimate in comfort & convenience. The spacious dining area overlooks the lounge & is adjacent to the well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher, plenty of cupboard & bench space & a box window overlooking the rear yard. There are 3 spacious bedrooms with robes & the master on the top level with ensuite, whilst there is a huge 4th bedroom/2nd living area on the lower level. This spacious family home oozes warmth & charm & needs to be seen to be fully appreciated!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Cute Character with Updated Kitchen
Situated in a quiet no through road just a short walk to the shops is this character- filled 2/3 bedroom home.
One of the original Cockatoo cottages, the property comes complete with modern open plan kitchen with Caesar stone benchtops and 'all in one' Blanco oven and stove overlooking the meals area.
The sunken lounge features floorboards, a beautiful large window to enjoy to view and a wood heater.
The two bedrooms upstairs are serviced by the bathroom with separate toilet.
Downstairs is a laundry and utility room which is currently used as a storage room.
Sit down in the evenings on the deck and enjoy the views across the valley whilst out the back in the tiered yard there is room to garden, play or do what ever you like.
Other features include polished floorboards, cooling, gas ducted heating, single carport plus another car spot, high ceilings, chook pen with run all on a usable 1/4 acre block (approx).
He who hesitates will miss this one!!
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 to arrange your inspection today!
Cockatoo
Cockatoo is a town in Victoria, 48 km south-east of Melbourne's central business district. Its local government area is the Shire of Cardinia. Cockatoo is named after Cockatoo Creek, which runs through the town, and which the town was previously named.
Cockatoo's small commercial centre is located along a steep section of McBride Street and includes a small supermarket and a selection of cafes and other places to eat. The Puffing Billy tourist railway line crosses right next to the shops at the base of McBride Street, recreating those days of stream train travel from long ago as it regularly passes through the town centre.
Cockatoo has a good selection of sporting facilities. In the town centre along the west side of Pakenham Road is a bowling club, basketball courts, tennis courts and other recreational facilities. The Cockatoo Sports Complex is located in Mountain Road and consists of an indoor stadium, oval, athletics track and netball courts.

Hills Getaway on 1/4 of an Acre (approx.)
Perfectly positioned in a quiet and convenient location is this cedar weatherboard home that has plenty to offer. Featuring 3 large bedrooms, master offering built in robes, large country style timber kitchen with plenty of cupboard space and living areas that consist of a lounge and meals area. Special features include gas heating, vaulted ceilings and large windows that allow plenty of natural light in. The home sits proudly on a usable 1/4 acre allotment that offers a peaceful outlook, fenced yard, covered & paved BBQ area perfect for entertaining in the warmer months and terraced lawn areas. This property is perfect for those looking to experience all that a hills lifestyle has to offer.

HOME IN COCKATOO WITH NOTHING TO DO!
This four bedroom property for sale in Cockatoo has all the character and charm you could want, as well as a fabulous tenant who would love to stay on at the property with a lease until February. So for any investor out there looking for money to invest wisely I have the right property for you! The home consists of 4 bedrooms, two bathrooms and all situated on a great block of approx 1306sqm. The property has plenty of space inside and out for kids and pets to play and grow, recently it has been given a makeover and all the rooms are fabulous but the kitchen is definitely one of the best features of this home. The photo's just don't do it justice, come and see for yourself!

Ready To Enjoy....

Description:
A Hills Escape On Over 1/2 An Acre
This ranch style home is perfectly positioned in a quiet and tranquil location boasting magnificent views of bushlands and the creek that flows past the property in a beautiful Fern Gully location.
Relaxing will be easy with a rear deck that overlooks the surrounds, or stay inside and enjoy the cozy warmth of the fireplace or cook up a storm in the open plan kitchen that adjoins the open plan lounge and dining room. Also on offer are 3 bedrooms all with robes, a split system heating and cooling unit and a large main bathroom with spa bath and a split system heating and cooling unit. Outside you will find lovely established gardens, garage/workshop & carport, all on a fully fenced 1/2 acre allotment.
To add to this already fantastic home are other bonuses such as high ceilings with exposed beams, feature exposed brick wall, large entry and much more. Make a time to visit this wonderful family home today!
Cockatoo
Cockatoo is a town in Victoria, 48 km south-east of Melbourne's central business district. Its local government area is the Shire of Cardinia. Cockatoo is named after Cockatoo Creek, which runs through the town, and which the town was previously named.
Cockatoo's small commercial centre is located along a steep section of McBride Street and includes a small supermarket and a selection of cafes and other places to eat. The Puffing Billy tourist railway line crosses right next to the shops at the base of McBride Street, recreating those days of stream train travel from long ago as it regularly passes through the town centre.
Cockatoo has a good selection of sporting facilities. In the town centre along the west side of Pakenham Road is a bowling club, basketball courts, tennis courts and other recreational facilities. The Cockatoo Sports Complex is located in Mountain Road and consists of an indoor stadium, oval, athletics track and netball courts.
Justin Barrot : 0438 683 781

Description:
THIS ONE TICKS ALL THE BOXES!
This meticulously maintained & recently renovated 4 bedroom family home will catch your eye right from the start with its beautiful, established gardens & street appeal. The home features 3 bedrooms, the Master with a walk in robe & ensuite, as well as a study or 4th bedroom. Flowing over 2 split levels there is the convenience of mains gas ducted heating, a convenient split system for the warmer days & a toasty wood heater for the family to gather around. The attractive, well-appointed kitchen has plenty of cupboard & bench space, a dishwasher & gas cooktop & overlooks the spacious family dining area. The formal lounge opens onto the undercover front verandah ideal for entertaining, with elevated outlook over the landscaped gardens & there is also a second living area inside to add to the comforts. Outside on the quarter acre block there is a second driveway, spacious shed with power, a mesh enclosed veggie patch, a 1000 lt water tank & a paved entertaining area where you can relax with a cuppa & enjoy your domain. Inspection is sure to impress!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
CHARACTER, VIEWS AND CHARM!
This unique Hills home creates a feeling of Zen, peace & tranquillity from the moment you enter through the gates into the fully fenced rear yard & enter your very own oasis. Outside you will find a private oriental garden, complete with lush lawns & a rotunda, perfect for meditating or just relaxing away the day with family & friends. Inside the flexible floor plan offers 2 bedrooms, a bathroom, a laundry & a comfortable lounge with gas heating & direct access/entry from an undercover decked area. Upstairs there is a spacious lounge with floor to ceiling windows & doors allowing you to take in the distant mountain views whilst letting in an abundance of natural light. The lounge opens onto a large deck, ideal for entertaining & the home can also be directly accessed via stairs up to the deck, providing a second entrance. The open plan kitchen has plenty of space for the budding chef to create their masterpiece & at the other end of the lounge is the huge Master Suite with more windows & views as well as a big walk in robe & an assimilated ensuite, giving the contemporary loft feel. This property is low maintenance, versatile, unique, peaceful & has magnificent views offering the ultimate in affordable Hills living!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
RENOVATED ON HALF AN ACRE!
This stylish home is situated on half an acre walking distance to public transport & Cockatoo, the shops, eateries & primary school. The home is stylishly renovated featuring a contemporary kitchen/meals area & rustic bathroom with a claw foot bath & ripple iron on the walls. The home offers 3 spacious bedrooms with built in robes & the home has mains gas ducted heating throughout for the ultimate in comfort & convenience, as well as a split system for the warmer days & an ambient solid wood heater that also has an oven & cook top built in, ideal for the avid baker. Add to this a circular drive, double carport & established gardens. Located at the end of a no through road & abutting Wright Forest where you will find walking tracks that can take you all the way to Emerald, this property is surrounded by wildlife & will not last long.

Description:
PRIVATE, CHARACTER 3 BEDROOM HOME ON HALF AN ACRE!
Privately located on half an acre, minutes from Cockatoo & 15 minutes from Pakenham & the Freeway, this solid 3 bedroom home oozes both character & charm. Inside you will find dado paneling, vaulted timber ceilings, gleaming slate floors & a solid fuel wood fire to add to the ambience, whilst the home has mains gas ducted heating & a split system for comfort & convenience. The home features zoned living with 2 spacious bedrooms (with built in robes) & the family bathroom at one end of the home & the Master Bedroom with walk through robes & huge, light filled ensuite with feature spa overlooking the gardens, at the other. The central, timber kitchen has a dishwasher, electric cooking & plenty of cupboard space, whilst the open plan lounge & dining area can comfortably fit that large family gathering. Outside there is vernandahs all round, an undercover entertaining area, a double garage with concrete floor & power, a chook shed, a 9000lt water tank, solar panels & a fully fenced half acre for the kids & animals to explore.

Description:
SIMPLE, SOLID & STYLISH!
This solid 3 bedroom family home is situated on a flat quarter of an acre block minutes from public transport & the heart of Cockatoo. The comfortable home features 3 bedrooms with built in robes, a spacious family bathroom, an open plan kitchen & dining area, a family lounge room & a huge undercover deck out the back with low voltage lighting & an outdoor living room for the ultimate comfort when entertaining family & friends. The well-appointed timber kitchen overlooks the rear deck & has heaps of bench & storage space, ideal for the budding chef. There is mains gas ducted heating for comfort, a formal entry, ideal for coats & boots & the home has been partially renovated with new carpets & a fresh coat of paint. Outside there is a fully fenced rear yard, perfect for the kids & their furry friends, a circular drive & a single lock up garage. Ideal as a first family home or investment, call to arrange a private inspection today!

Description:
FIRST HOME BUYERS & INVESTOR ALERT !
This charming 2 bedroom home is located on a quarter of an acre on a sealed road just a short stroll from the heart of Cockatoo, the primary school, public transport & the various shops, restaurants & take aways. Set amongst an established garden the home has an open plan kitchen, living, dining area with a feature slow combustion wood heater to keep you warm & the added bonus of a mains gas connected heater & an air conditioner for added comfort & convenience. The Master features a wall of robes & there is also an updated bathroom & functional laundry. Outside there is a big undercover deck, ideal for entertaining all year round overlooking the rear yard. Add to this a carport & plenty of scope to expand & improve (STCA) - all you need is the vision!

Description:
METICULOUSLY MAINTAINED PRIVATE PARADISE!
This immaculate home situated on over an acre of magnificent gardens is sure to impress the most fastidious of buyers. The home features 3 bedrooms, the master bedroom with a walk in robe & ensuite for convenience. The spacious formal lounge is located adjacent to the formal dining area with direct access to the verandah overlooking the peaceful gardens the perfect place to relax or entertain. The spacious open plan kitchen/living area with pitched ceiling & Celestine windows, which let in an abundance of natural light, has a gas log heater for added ambience, whilst the home has mains GDH throughout for comfort & convenience. The well-appointed, contemporary kitchen features a gas stove & electric oven, a dishwasher & plenty of cupboard & bench space. Outside there is a double carport, a convenient circular drive, a garden shed, a huge veggie patch, meandering garden paths, a workshop & heaps of storage space. Add to this solar hot water & all mains services within minutes of Cockatoo. What more could you want?
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
